feed.title: OCaml Ecosystem - Weekly Summaries
feed.subtitle: Comprehensive weekly summaries across all OCaml ecosystem activity

entry.title: Week 13, 2025: Relocatable OCaml RFC submitted, major Merlin update processed, ecosystem packages improved, and build tool Windows compatibility enhanced
entry.summary: Relocatable OCaml RFC submitted, major Merlin update processed, ecosystem packages improved, and build tool Windows compatibility enhanced

entry.title: Week 14, 2025: Memory safety fixes merged, Dune 3.18.0 released, platform compatibility improved, and Flambda2 optimizations advanced
entry.summary: Memory safety fixes merged, Dune 3.18.0 released, platform compatibility improved, and Flambda2 optimizations advanced

entry.title: Week 15, 2025: Module system advances with transparent ascription RFC approved for OCaml Foundation funding while cross-platform tools fixes addressed
entry.summary: Module system advances with transparent ascription RFC approved for OCaml Foundation funding while cross-platform tools fixes addressed

entry.title: Week 16, 2025: Type system advances, major tool releases, package ecosystem improvements, and memory safety fixes across the OCaml ecosystem

entry.title: Week 17, 2025: Transparent ascription RFC development advanced while Docker compatibility and memory optimization received focus across tools
entry.summary: Transparent ascription RFC development advanced while Docker compatibility and memory optimization received focus across tools

entry.title: Week 18, 2025: Runtime stability focus with GC fixes, major release of Dune 3.18.2 for OCaml 5.4 compatibility, and extensive documentation improvements
entry.summary: Runtime stability focus with GC fixes, major release of Dune 3.18.2 for OCaml 5.4 compatibility, and extensive documentation improvements

entry.title: Week 19, 2025: Opam 2.4.0-alpha2 released with GC fixes and RFC implementation approval while tools receive major performance enhancements
entry.summary: Opam 2.4.0-alpha2 released with GC fixes and RFC implementation approval while tools receive major performance enhancements

entry.title: Week 20, 2025: Transparent ascription RFC progressed to implementation phase while parser modernization and WebAssembly development accelerated across ecosystem
entry.summary: Transparent ascription RFC progressed to implementation phase while parser modernization and WebAssembly development accelerated across ecosystem

entry.title: Week 21, 2025: Dune 3.19.0 stable release delivered alongside multicore performance optimization and OCaml 5.4 compatibility preparations
